name: Flappy Coin (CDNO)
description:
GAMEPLAY

Navigate the trading chart and pump the coin as high as possible! Trend lines on the chart will be influenced by messages you pick up along the way. Green will nudge the trend up and red will nudge the trend down. Some messages will drastically change the trend, watch out for those!

The chart is randomly generated so no session will be the same. 

Disclaimer: Any messages in this game are for entertainment purposes only and should not be considered financial advice. RELEASE NOTES
  • Recommended browser: Chrome. 
  • Currently there is only a local score board but I will investigate the possibility to add a global score board as well. 
  • Max score is $30,000 at the moment but will look into making it infinite if needed.
